heading: Offshore Romance | Couple Tour Package of Andaman

itinerary.day1Overview: After arrival, you will be transferred to the hotel for check-in. Later, you will get transferred to the Corbyn Cove Beach, admire its beautiful shore and palm trees. Next, you will visit the Cellular Jail and enjoy a light show, before getting dropped off at the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day2Overview: Post check out, you will get transferred to the Phoenix Bay Harbour for a ferry ride to Havelock Island. Upon arrival, check in at the hotel. Later, you will get transferred to Radhanagar Beach, known for its scenic views. After the visit, you'll get dropped off at the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day3Heading: Kalapathar Beach Tour | Transfer to Port Blair
itinerary.day3Overview: In the morning, you will be picked up from the hotel and visit the Kalapathar Beach, enjoying a wonderful sunrise over the Indian Ocean. Afterwards, check out from the hotel and get transferred to Port Blair via a relaxing ferry ride. Check in at your hotel in Port Blair for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day4Overview: Start your day with a ferry ride to Ross and North Bay Islands from Port Blair for a full day tour. Enjoy water sports like snorkeling and scuba diving (at your own expense). Next, visit Ross Island, known for its penal colony. Post visit, you will be transferred to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day5Overview: After you check out from your hotel, you will be transferred to the airport for your flight back home. This marks the end of your trip.

exclusions: All kinds of personal expenses such as tips, laundry, telephone bills and beverages
It does not include any meals unless and otherwise specifically mentioned.
Guide at Cellular jail will cost extra.
Any dispute regarding the child age to be settled directly with the hotels.
inclusions: Accommodation on double/triple sharing basis at above-mentioned hotels / similar in base category rooms.
Airport pick up and drop by a/c vehicle.
Makruzz / Green Ocean Cruise / Sea Link / Nautika / ITT Majestic (base category) for Neil & Havelock as per the availability.
All Toll, Parking, Driver Bata & Fuel Cost
Assistance at all arrival and departure points.
Entry permits | Entry tickets | Parking charges | Boat/ferry tickets wherever applicable

overView.heading: Andaman Delight: Discovering Havelock and Port Blair
overView.text: Embark on a captivating journey through the enchanting islands of Andaman, where Havelock and Port Blair showcase the region's pristine beaches, vibrant marine life, and rich cultural heritage.

overView.heading: Beachfront Bliss in Havelock
overView.text: Immerse yourself in the turquoise waters and white sandy beaches of Havelock. Experience the serene beauty of Radhanagar Beach, indulge in water activities, and unwind in this tropical paradise surrounded by the Andaman Sea.

overView.heading: Historical Charm of Port Blair
overView.text: Explore the historical landmarks of Port Blair, the capital city of Andaman. Visit the Cellular Jail, witness the Sound and Light Show narrating the region's history, and stroll through the vibrant markets offering local crafts and delicacies.

overView.heading: Island Adventure: Beyond the Waves
overView.text: Delve into the underwater wonders surrounding Havelock and Port Blair. Snorkel or dive to discover vibrant coral reefs and diverse marine life. These islands offer a paradise for water enthusiasts, promising unforgettable aquatic experiences.

overView.heading: Cultural Encounters
overView.text: Engage in the cultural tapestry of Andaman. Discover the traditions of the indigenous tribes, explore local markets, and savor the unique Andamanese cuisine. The islands blend natural beauty with a rich cultural heritage.

overView.heading: Preserving Marine Heritage
overView.text: Andaman is committed to preserving its marine ecosystems. From responsible tourism practices to coral conservation initiatives, the islands strive to protect their underwater treasures for future generations to marvel at.

overView.heading: Plan Your Andaman Escape
overView.text: Whether seeking beachfront bliss, historical insights, or underwater adventures, Andaman promises an unforgettable journey. Plan your escape to this tropical haven, where every wave tells a story, and every moment is a celebration of Andaman's allure.
